Description:
Detects Obfuscated use of stdin to execute PowerShell

Author: Jonathan Cheong, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Invoke-Obfuscation STDIN+ Launcher - PowerShell Module
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where payload re 'cmd.{0,5}(?:/c|/r).+powershell.+(?:\$\{?input\}?|noexit).+"'
